description:
Due to the left’s beholding to trans ideology, a Virginia school allowed a serial sex offender to watch minor girls change in a high school locker room. And this did not have to happen because it was so painfully predictable it’s not even funny. However, it did happen, but trans activists are requesting the school forget about this, as they claim it has nothing to do with the “gender identity of the person who entered the pool locker room.”

Did this make sense? Because it shouldn’t have, as nothing these people say means anything.

Two women come forward about a trans-identifying pedophile who exposed himself to women & two children in a public locker room in VA.

"He sat in our locker room naked and watched us get undressed."

Sick. THROW AWAY THE K
title: Activists demand school uphold trans policy policy, even after predator was caught in the locker room

description:
Just imagine we were living in the year 2005 and you heard the POTUS say, “Women's sports will be only for women.” You would think that is the most pointless statement and demand an explanation. But the fact that this needs to be said on top of an executive order defining biological reality, speaks volumes as to how insane society has gotten.

This is why Trump said what needed to be said.

President Trump:

"We will not allow men to beat up, injure, and cheat our women and our girls. From now on, women's sports will be only for women." pic.twitter.com/1m2rqLf2aS
— Townhall.com (@townhallcom) February 5, 2025
title: Donald Trump takes powerful pro-woman stand with EO banning boys from girl's sports: "Women's sports will be only for women"

description:
Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt laid out more nonsense USAID has been spending your tax dollars on and it’s worse than you think.

Politico got more than $8 million from the bureaucratic organization, essentially “subsidizing subscriptions" on "the American taxpayer's dime." However, this will no longer be the status quo, as DODGE is going “line by line” to end this sort of nonsense.

JUST IN: Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt says media outlets including Politico will no longer be making millions of dollars with taxpayer money.

"I was made aware of the funding from USAID to media outlets including Politico who I know has a seat in this room..."

"I can… pic.twitter.com/zXtdodFQzo
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg
title: Watch: Karoline Leavitt reveals insane amount of taxpayer dollars a media outlet got and what the Trump Admin is doing about it

description:
It’s unclear why Nancy Mace has to tiptoe around the subjective, indescribable feelings of the trans community, but one man in Congress is demanding she does just that.

Rep. Gerry Connolly wasted everyone's time because he had a problem with Mace using the term “tranny,” as he believed this was politically incorrect.

Rep. Gerry Connolly whines about @NancyMace saying "tranny" during a Congressional hearing

It's 2025, and the left is more concerned about offending people than keeping men out of women's restrooms.pic.twitter.com/JUZuMzBiQY
— Media Research Center (@theMRC)
title: Watch: Nancy Mace gets scolded for using an anti-trans "slur" in a hearing, her response is perfection

description:

description:
Now that the dust is settling on Kamala Harris and the Democrat Party's epic electoral failure, it's time for the books to come out. Journalismer sat on a lot of news to be monetized at a later date, and various lefties need to spin that it was everyone's fault but their own. Up first is "FIGHT: Inside the Wildest Battle for the White House" by Jonathan Allen and Amie Parnes. One of the stories puts the blame on Joe Rogan for Kamala Harris not making an appearance on the podcast. Calling bullsh*t on that? Joe Rogan.

Apparently, the authors never contacted him about his side of the story. Go figure.

Some claims made:

  1. Rogan had "conditions"<
title: Watch: Joe Rogan calls BS on new book's claim about the Kamala Harris interview, and he has receipts

description:
Far be it from me to advise the Democratic Party to do anything. The more they melt down and make all the winning Trump is doing that much more glorious, the better for hustling content. However, if I may be so bold as to offer a suggestion, when the Left has grown so unhinged and discombobulated that even CNN is laughing at them, they might want to consider a different tactic. There claims that Elon Musk is forming a shadow government? LOL no.

Cousin Elon is the left's new boogieman. He is Haliburton and the Koch Brothers using Project 2025 to destroy the internet if we don't pass Net Neutrality. Or that's at least the new talking point their billionaires have come up with to attack our billionaires.

pic.twitter.com/Rgto4
title: Watch: Democrat attempts to resist Elon Musk's alleged "shadow government" are so far off the rails, even CNN's laughing at them
